Verses: 1 yoodhaavil Dhevan Ariyappattavar; Isravelil Avarudaiya Naamam Periyadhu.
2 saalemil Avarudaiya Koodaaramum, Seeyonil Avarudaiya Vaasasdhalamum Irukkiradhu.
3 angeyirundhu Villin Ambugalaiyum, Kedagaththaiyum, Pattayaththaiyum, Yuththaththaiyum Muriththaar. (selaa.)
5 dhairiya Nenjullavargal Kollaiyidappattu, Niththiraiyadaindhu Asarndhaargal; Vallamaiyulla Ellaa Manusharudaiya Kaigalum Avargalukku Udhavaamarpoyitru.
6 yaakkobin Dhevane, Ummudaiya Kantidhaththinaal Iradhangalum Kudhiraigalum Urangi Vizhundhadhu.
7 neer, Neere, Bayangaramaanavar; Umadhu Kobam Moolumpodhu Umakku Munbaaga Nirpavan Yaar?
8 niyaayam Visaarikkavum Boomiyil Sirumaippattavargal Yaavaraiyum Iratchikkavum, Dhevareer Ezhundharulinapodhu,
9 vaanaththilirundhu Niyaayaththeerppuk Ketkappannineer; Boomi Bayandhu Amarndhadhu. (selaa.)
10 manushanudaiya Kobam Umadhu Magimaiyai Vilangappannum; Minjungopaththai Neer Adakkuveer.
11 poruththanaipanni Adhai Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Niraivetrungal; Avaraich Soozhndhirukkira Anaivarum Bayangaramaanavarukkuk Kaanikkaigalaik Konduvarakkadavargal.
12 pirabukgalin Aaviyai Adakkuvaar; Boomiyin Raajaakkalukku Avar Bayangaramaanavar.
